name: Super Hamster Ball (itch)
description:
In Super Hamster Ball you are a sewer surfing hamster looking for snacks while tumbling down the pipes.

A short one level game we made for our self organized  SuperShort2DayJam gamejam.

Controls
use A and D to run left or right in your hamsterball.
use Spacebar to hop.

credits:
Carrot_man - programmer
Chloe Stratton - sound designer
Ilia Kole - levels and art

v0.9.1 fixed data map
v0.9: Pickup audio is placeholder, will get replaced with proper sounds later.
